channel.title: I need these two commands
channel.description: hey guys so i need these two commands: 1. ::update -time- which shows a text in the bottom left of the screen above the chat box that says updating in : time or restarting in : time and after that time it will automatically restart the server. 2. ::message you all know that one :P. any help would be great

item.title: I need these two commands
item.dc:creator: @own_master own master
item.description:
@own_master wrote:

zyle1992:

Well you could make these yourself. All you need to do is think about what you want to be done in a logical manner.

well I’m not really good with coding I’m still in my first year all i know is methods and a few other stuff
but thanks for the advice :D.

[quote=“pasta186, post:2, topic:397921”]If your using delta 317,they would be :

if(command.startsWith("update") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("yOURNAMEHERE") && (command.length() > 7))  {
				PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command
						.substring(7)) + 1);
				PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
				PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
				PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
			}

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“message”) && command.length() > 8 && playerRights >= 3) {

		String text = command.substring(8);
		yell("[SERVER]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

}

[/code][/quote]
thank you nice sir ;D.

Read full topic

item.title: I need these two commands
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

If your using delta 317,they would be :

if(command.startsWith("update") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("yOURNAMEHERE") && (command.length() > 7))  {
				PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command
						.substring(7)) + 1);
				PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
				PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
				PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
			}
 if (command.startsWith("message") && command.length() > 8 && playerRights >= 3) {

			String text = command.substring(8);
			yell("[SERVER]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
				

}

Read full topic
